title: "New Skin Tone Measure Unveiled for Enhanced Face Recognition Accuracy"
excerpt: "Researchers have developed a novel skin tone measure that accurately represents skin color from a single image, paving the way for more equitable and accurate face recognition (FR) systems. This innovation is crucial in addressing the differential performance of FR models across diverse demographics,"
